author: wn.com
title: Hillary 'An Extraordinary Policy Mind' Undermined By Her Own 'Politically Convenient Policy Changes'
text: In 2008, Hillary Clinton was running against an inexperienced, untested young senator named Barack Obama. Clinton was known as one of the most serious policy wonks to ever run for president, and her network included most of Democratic Party's top policy staff, many of whom had worked directly for her or her husband. -- This feed and its contents are the property of The Huffington Post, and use is subject to our terms.
